name: Better Editor for Oxygen
author: Gabriele Iacovone

sections.description:
This plugin add some functionalities to the Oxygen Editor.

Plugin Features:

  1. Oxygen Structure opened by default on editor loads.
  2. Back to templates/pages menu in dropdown menu.
  3. Display the current template/page name you are editing.
  4. Editor UI improvements.

There are no settings for the plugin. Just install it.

Automatic Installation

Search for better editor for oxygen from within your WordPress plugins Add New page and install.

Manual Installation

  1. Click on the Download button to download the plugin.
  2. Upload the entire better-editor-for-oxygen folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
2.0.2

  • Removed admin notification

2.0.1

  • New “Exit to” menu.
  • Updated overhall UI.
  • New UI for the structure panel.
  • Centered Viewport.

2.0

  • Total revision of the plugin.
  • Compatibility with Oxygen v4.

1.1

  • Fixed some css issues.

1.0.0

Initial Release.

short_description: Improve the Oxygen builder Editor: Structure opened by default, Back to Templates/Pages/Posts Menu, Display Currently Editing & more.

upgrade_notice.1.1: Fixed css issues when currently editing name wasn't displaying correctly for long Templates/Pages names.

screenshots.caption: Oxygen Structure Tree opened by default.
Show the current template/page you are editing.
